issue.title: [CF 1039] Request a new feature: distinguish whether an unusable rune is refreshing or locked
issue.body:
Thanks a lot for your amazing addon. It helps me much in the game.

The TMW is able to identify whether a rune is usable or not, but it seems that the TMW cannot distinguish whether an unusable rune is refreshing or locked.

Is that possible to add such status, which are usable, refreshing and locked, rather than usable and unusable?

The reason why this function is important for me is the Blood tape talent. To fully use its value, a locked blood/frost/unholy should be refreshed and turned into a death rune. But if a locked death rune is refreshed by the blood tap, part of the value is wasted.

For example, we have a pair of unusable blood runes, one of them is a blood rune, the other one is a death rune in blood rune position. The blood rune is expected to be refreshed, but only if this rune is locked, the blood tap should be used.

Many thanks for your time.


> Posted by CurseForge user WarBringerC | Imported from CurseForge issue #1039 | Raw
